cab.content: SECRET.OPERATIONS.From:- General Delme Radcliffe, Italy. To :- C,I,G.S,, War Office.Handed in:- 2 a,in,)) 31/12/1917. Rec 'd:- 7,20 a,m, )10085 December 30th evening..No change in situation on 3rd Army front. Hostile artillery active between Fagare and Maserada on December 29th and on 4th Army front in Val Brenta on. Costalunga and Val Cresilia on night of December 29th-3Oth,Aerial activity. Enemy bombed Treviso Istrana Monte Belluna and Padua on night of December 29th-30th, Slight casualties at Padua, some material damage.0
